participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is compassionate and nurturing, always ready to lend a hand to those in need. She has a creative streak and enjoys sharing her love for music with her students.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Sarah is friendly and upbeat, with a love for nature and animals. She has a strong sense of community and finds joy in nurturing her garden and her relationships.
participant_2.background: i work as a school teacher. i've a dogs. i enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. i am a woman. i attend church every week.
